name: Entertainment Hero
description: Eight Stages of Run and Gun Action Leading to the Final Boss! Choose Different Paths on Different Play Throughs! Search for the Secrets Hidden in the Different Lands!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support. Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 MB available space
